titles: The state-mysteries of the Iesuites, by way of questions and answers. Faithfully extracted out of their owne writings by themselues published. And a catalogue prefixed of the authors names which are cited in this booke. Written for a premonition in these times both to the publike and particular. Translated out of French
author: Rivet, André, 1572-1651.
Gosselin, Peter.
publisher: Printed by G[eorge] E[ld] for Nicholas Bourne,
notes: A translation of: Rivet, André.  Les mysteres des peres jesuites.
Running title reads: The mysteries of the Iesuites.
A variant of the edition with Nathaniel Butter named as publisher in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Jesuits --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
